StreamClientProducer.​ThreadController
StreamClientProducer.​ThreadController

*This class controls all the threads in this application and handles coordination between them.

Variables
messageQueue
ConcurrentQueue<String> messageQueue

*All messages that come in from the irc clients will be placed into this queue.  * It is shard with all <ClientThread> objects and the <TwitchProducer> class.

trigger
static System.Timers.Timer trigger

This timer triggers the event for each fo the <CLientThread> threads to check for a new message.

Twitch Clients
Channels

A list of all the channels that currently have a TwitchClient assosiated with them

Clients

Holds all the TwitchClient instances.

Kafka Clients
producer

The KafkaProducer that will publish all of the incoming messages to the Kafka server.

pro

The thread assosiated with producer

command

the CommandConsumer that subscribes to the COMMANDS topic on the Kafka server for IPC

com

the thread assosiated with command

blacklist
HashSet<string> blacklist

*this is a set of all the users that are blocked from having messages read in producer

Functions
ThreadController
public ThreadController()

The constructor for ThreadController Initializes the above objects, starts the trigger timer and starts the pro and com threads

addClient
public void addClient(
string channel
)

Creates a new TwitchClient and adds it to clients

Parameter
channel
string

The name of the channel to create a client for.

dropClient
public void dropClient(
string channel
)

Removes a client from the application

Parameter
channel
string

The name of the channel that should have it's client dropped.

listThreads
public void listThreads()

Prints a list of the currently running channels to the console

queueSize
public int queueSize()

Prints the amount of messages that are waiting to be published to Kafka.

exit
public void exit()

Shuts down all of the threads and then closes the application.

listBlacklist
public void listBlacklist()

Lists all of the users that are curently in blacklist
